columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource Id.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioned state of the resource. Possible values include: 'Running', 'Creating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Failed'.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the resource. Possible values include: 'Creating', 'Deleted', 'Deleting', 'Running', 'Starting', 'Stopped', 'Stopping', 'Unavailable'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Specifies the name of the region, the resource is created at.

columns.name: data_ingestion_uri
columns.description: The cluster data ingestion URI.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An ETag of the resource created.

columns.name: enable_disk_encryption
columns.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

columns.name: enable_double_encryption
columns.description: A boolean value that indicates if double encryption is enabled.

columns.name: enable_purge
columns.description: A boolean value that indicates if the purge operations are enabled.

columns.name: enable_streaming_ingest
columns.description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

columns.name: engine_type
columns.description: The engine type. Possible values include: 'EngineTypeV2', 'EngineTypeV3'.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: SKU capacity of the resource.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: SKU name of the resource. Possible values include: 'KC8', 'KC16', 'KS8', 'KS16', 'D13V2', 'D14V2', 'L8', 'L16'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: SKU tier of the resource.

columns.name: state_reason
columns.description: SKU tier of the resource.

columns.name: uri
columns.description: The cluster URI.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

columns.name: language_extensions
columns.description: List of the cluster's language extensions.

columns.name: key_vault_properties
columns.description: KeyVault properties for the cluster encryption.

columns.name: optimized_autoscale
columns.description: Optimized auto scale definition.

columns.name: trusted_external_tenants
columns.description: The cluster's external tenants.

columns.name: virtual_network_configuration
columns.description: Virtual network definition of the resource.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
